page.title: 15SHOPPING IN THE SEISDON AREA
page.content: The only shop in this block is the Post Office/general stores situated in Seisdon, just inside the south-east corner of the area. Shopping presents quite a problem for some of the inhabitants, especially those who do not live near the bus route or own a car. For those who are able to travel, Wolverhampton is usually the main shopping centre visited but some prefer the quieter atmosphere of Bridgnorth and the markets there on Fridays and Saturdays are very popular. There are some mobile shops which visit the district and provide a real service for more isolated customers. There are several farm shops and other local people sell their produce from home on a seasonal basis but probably townspeople from Wolverhampton are the principal customers here.
